title: OpenAI acquires Global Illumination
summary: OpenAI has acquired the team at Global Illumination, a company known for leveraging AI to build creative tools and digital experiences. The team, which includes individuals with experience at Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Google, Pixar, Riot Games, and other notable companies, will be joining OpenAI to work on core products such as ChatGPT. OpenAI is excited about the potential impact this team will have on their organization.
